title: Caramel Macchiato
directions: Steam one cup of milk until frothy.
Pour the espresso into a cup.
Gently pour the steamed milk over the espresso, holding back the foam with a spoon to create a layered effect.
Drizzle caramel syrup over the top.
Optional: Add whipped cream for an extra indulgent touch.
notes: For homemade caramel syrup, see the separate caramel syrup recipe. Store-bought caramel syrup works as well.
